title: Hawaiian Fishes
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seal

L margi LRC: [ 遠志 ] {Tōshi}; LRC, in pencil: [Toshi Yoshid
description: three large, black, grey, white, and lime green angel fish at center and R edge; three greyscale fish at LL and shadow of coral; shadow of another smaller fish at LR
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
